channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Maximo Application Suite
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Maximo Application Suite

item.title: CVE-2023-27861|2024-08-02T12:23:30.116Z -- ibm -- maximo%20application%20suite
item.description: IBM Maximo Application Suite - Manage Component 8.8.0 and 8.9.0 transmits sensitive information in cleartext that could be intercepted by an attacker using man in the middle techniques. IBM X-Force ID: 249208.

item.title: CVE-2024-22333|2024-06-18T14:11:47.420Z -- ibm -- maximo%20application%20suite
item.description: IBM Maximo Asset Management 7.6.1.3 and IBM Maximo Application Suite 8.10 and 8.11 allows web pages to be stored locally which can be read by another user on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 279973.

item.title: CVE-2023-32335|2024-03-13T09:23:23.225Z -- ibm -- maximo%20application%20suite
item.description: IBM Maximo Application Suite 8.10, 8.11 and IBM Maximo Asset Management 7.6.1.3 stores sensitive information in URL parameters. This may lead to information disclosure if unauthorized parties have access to the URLs via server logs, referrer header or browser history. IBM X-Force ID: 255075.

item.title: CVE-2024-22328|2024-06-04T17:52:25.701Z -- ibm -- maximo%20application%20suite
item.description: IBM Maximo Application Suite 8.10 and 8.11 could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially crafted URL request containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to view arbitrary files on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 279950.

item.title: CVE-2024-22333|2024-06-13T13:55:39.767Z -- ibm -- maximo%20application%20suite
item.description: IBM Maximo Asset Management 7.6.1.3 and IBM Maximo Application Suite 8.10 and 8.11 allows web pages to be stored locally which can be read by another user on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 279973.

item.title: CVE-2024-22333|2024-08-01T22:43:34.457Z -- ibm -- maximo%20application%20suite
item.description: IBM Maximo Asset Management 7.6.1.3 and IBM Maximo Application Suite 8.10 and 8.11 allows web pages to be stored locally which can be read by another user on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 279973.

item.title: CVE-2024-22328|2024-08-01T22:43:34.522Z -- ibm -- maximo%20application%20suite
item.description: IBM Maximo Application Suite 8.10 and 8.11 could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially crafted URL request containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to view arbitrary files on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 279950.
